channel.title: Twitter / richtaur
channel.description: Twitter updates from Matt Hackett / richtaur.

item.title: richtaur: Xbox 360 requires a paid-for account to develop for *your own device*. Boo! Just as awful as Apple (really no surprise there).
item.description: richtaur: Xbox 360 requires a paid-for account to develop for *your own device*. Boo! Just as awful as Apple (really no surprise there).

item.title: richtaur: The latest XNA Game Studio works with Visual C# 2008 but not Visual C# 2010. Dumb.
item.description: richtaur: The latest XNA Game Studio works with Visual C# 2008 but not Visual C# 2010. Dumb.

item.title: richtaur: Stupid easily distracted brain. Looks like I will be very productive today, just not on the project that I'd prefer.
item.description: richtaur: Stupid easily distracted brain. Looks like I will be very productive today, just not on the project that I'd prefer.

item.title: richtaur: OK first big disappointment with Google App Engine is the lack of native analytics, plus AFAICT it's tough to integrate them. WTF??
item.description: richtaur: OK first big disappointment with Google App Engine is the lack of native analytics, plus AFAICT it's tough to integrate them. WTF??

item.title: richtaur: @izs I've had my new PC for gaming and multimedia for about a week now and it's already crashed twice. That's more than my Macbook in months

item.title: richtaur: There's nothing quite like release day when a game comes out that I've been itching to play for months. So exciting!

item.title: richtaur: RT @JoshuaMorse: The toughest part of starting your week = remembering what the crap you were doing the week before-hand...
